title: Govt borrowing decreases bond prices, increases PL

content.question: Assume that a countryâ€™s government increases borrowing. What will most likely happen to the prices of previously issued bonds and the price level in the short run?

choices.label: Bond Prices Price Level Increase Increase
Bond Prices Price Level Increase Decrease
Bond Prices Price Level Increase No change
Bond Prices Price Level Decrease Increase
Bond Prices Price Level Decrease Decrease

content.answer: Bond Prices Price Level Decrease Increase

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
